Articles.Content:
Hey Guys, 

I have a huge problem. I can´t remove science from any science objektive, with any scientist!! I cant! I try to remove it with Bob Kerman and it says "you need a scientist to remove science correctly. Bob is a scientist, why does it not work???

Are you using any mods? It looks like this is regarding a Mystery Goo instrument?

If you right click on the Mystery Goo, is there a Collect Data button? If you click that, does a new window pop up? Is there a "Remove Data" button for you to click?

The warning message on that window is not about problems collecting the data. It involves resetting the instrument to take another measurement afterwards.

Edited April 30, 2016 by bewing

4 hours ago, Zelop said:

I try to remove it with Bob Kerman and it says "you need a scientist to remove science correctly. Bob is a scientist, why does it not work???

I believe that is just a warning that pops up no matter what, even if you're using a scientist. Just go ahead and remove the science, and then your scientist can restore the experiment. 

Unless I'm misunderstanding and you've tried that and it still doesn't work. In that case, there might be a bug, in that case do as @bewing suggests.

Thanks to all. I don´t what I did differently but now the warning doesnt pops up?????

Anyway, I don´t have this problem anymore so thank you for your advices!!!!
